Title: Faith
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Toni Graphia (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Dominique Pinon
Plot: Doctors at L'Hopital des Anges attempt to save the lives of Claire and her unborn baby; King Louis asks Claire to judge two men accused of engaging in the dark arts.
